description: For a tee that’s stylish, practical, and eco-conscious, look no further than our Men’s Merino Hemp Blend Pocket Tee. Made of a blend of Merino wool and hemp, this tee is cut to a regular fit that gives you room to move. With popular touches like seams designed to help reduce chafing and a chest pocket, this shirt can just as wearable under a backpack as on a stroll downtown.
name: Smartwool Merino Hemp Blend Pocket Tee - Mens
